nodes.text: The Professional Podracing Circuit was a series of three one-lap Podracing courses on Cloud City in Bespin, Coruscant and the Boonta Eve Classic on Tatooine. The circuit was part of the Galactic Podracing Circuit, and was preceded by the Outer Rim Regional Podracing Circuit.
Podracers Mars Guo and Teemto Pagalies were known to have participated in the circuit during the final decades of the Galactic Republic.
